titles.title: Wonderful birth, to a manger He came

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wonderful birth, to a manger He came, made in the likeness of man, to proclaim God’s boundless love for a world sick with sin, pleading with sinners to let Him come in.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wonderful death, for it meant not defeat, Calvary made His great mission complete, wrought our redemption, and when He arose, banished for ever the last of our foes.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
